name: truck parking 3D car simulator game
description:
this is very nice truck parking 3D car simulator game
Real 3D truck parking car simulator game with nice truck car and real beautiful industrial city
Nice 3D truck car parking and car racing, rally game to the parking spot
How fast you will drive and parking your car complete all 8 levels well ??
Test your driving and parking skills in this new and exciting 3D truck parking car simulator game!
A UNIQUE DRIVING EXPERIENCE WITH GORGEOUS 3D GRAPHICS
Your goal in this game is to park your car in the designated locations while avoiding obstacles.
There is a time limit to keep you on your toes.
If you have never driven a truck car or bus before, then this game will give you that unique experience of driving a large vehicle.
It's very different experience from driving a sports car or a compact car like you may have experienced in racing games such as many sports car racing games ever
Your precision driving skills will be tested and pushed to the limit!
truck car parking 3D simulator game 3D features:
8 Exciting levels!
- Beautiful 3D truck car and environment graphics
- Unique truck driving car simulator experience!
- Beautiful 3D army truck car model!
How to play truck parking 3D car simulator game
- Left right steering buttons to control driving your sports truck car
- Driving you sports truck car to the parking spot
see this video of truck parking 3D car simulator game
